blog.source:
## Utility Chain Explorer for Lothar

Dijets Utility Chain running on Lothar Testnet functions just like the Utility Chain running on Dijets Mainnet. It is an EVM instance powered by Dijets protocol making it interoperable with other active primary chains running on the same network i.e. Mainnet or Testnet. Assets such as (ERC20, ERC721 etc) can be bridged to Dijets Network to take full advantage of its sub-second finality and extremely low transaction fees. Ethereum developers can quickly build on Dijets as Solidity is fully compatible with the Utility Chain. 

The Utility Chain explorer for Lothar provides a comprehensive, easy-to-use interface for users to view, confirm, and inspect transactions conducted on Dijets Testnet.

Users can search transactions, view accounts and balances, verify and interact with smart contracts and view and interact with applications running on the testnet.

## UC Explorer Link

[Lothar UC Explorer](https://lothar-testnet.uksouth.cloudapp.azure.com/)

blog.description: Explorer Utility Chain txs on Lothar TestNet.
